director.name: 坎塔拉马·加蒂吉里 Kantarama Gahigiri

introduction: In a lawless Kenya, a decade after the 2030 great mineral war, little Adea, abducted child miner, finds a large tanzanite gem and triggers a violent chain reaction involving a traditional ninja gang and the eccentric and notoriously corrupt Mike Sankara, Minister of Culture. Will Machachari, the once famous zany detective, outsmart all of them and find the tanzanite before it destroys her community?
